com.udeyrishi.pipe

Interface PipelineDispatcher


  • public PipelineDispatcher

    Represents a dispatcher that will be used to start all pipe coroutines. This dispatcher is converted into an effective kotlin.coroutines.CoroutineContext by joining the PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher and the PipelineDispatcher.onInternalPipeError implementation.

    See Also:
    kotlin.coroutines.CoroutineContext, PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher, PipelineDispatcher.onInternalPipeError

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher getCoroutineDispatcher()
      The dispatcher to be used for launching job coroutines.
      void onInternalPipeError(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      A fallback handler that will be invoked if there are any unexpected exceptions in pipe. This does not include actual logical errors that can be safely thrown in the different steps. This is only for safely dealing with bugs in the pipe project.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoroutineDispatcher

        kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher getCoroutineDispatcher()

        The dispatcher to be used for launching job coroutines.

      • onInternalPipeError

        void onInternalPipeError(java.lang.Throwable throwable)

        A fallback handler that will be invoked if there are any unexpected exceptions in pipe. This does not include actual logical errors that can be safely thrown in the different steps. This is only for safely dealing with bugs in the pipe project.

        Will be invoked on a coroutine supplied by the PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher

        See Also:
        PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher
